meanings.definition: Relating to childbirth or the care of women during pregnancy and childbirth.
meanings.sent1: The obstetrically trained nurse assisted the mother during labor.
meanings.sent2: The doctor provided obstetrically sound advice to the expectant mother.
meanings.sent3: The obstetrically decorated nursery had a stork theme.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as carefully planned as an obstetrically timed delivery.
meanings.sent5: The hospital room was filled with obstetrically themed artwork.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the medical specialty of obstetrics.
meanings.sent1: She observed the procedure obstetrically, noting every detail.
meanings.sent2: The doctor acted obstetrically when delivering the baby.
meanings.sent3: He ran obstetrically to the delivery room, trying not to spill his coffee.
meanings.sent4: The nurse's attention to detail was as precise as an obstetrically trained professional.
meanings.sent5: The team worked obstetrically to ensure a safe birth for the mother.
